box1.title: RAAC Interim Management
box1.text: RAAC provides, on an interim basis, the post of quality manager or quality coordinator for your company. This can be on a temporary basis in case of illness or absence of the Quality Manager. Or as a part time base like 1 day a week, month or any other frequency your organization needs. This option is mostly used when there is not enough time to full fill a fulltime post.

box2.title: Advice during external audit
box2.text:
Hereby you can think of guiding external audits, conducting internal audits, management reviews and training of your employees. Interim manage is also possible at the premises of your supplier. We can also train your supplier to your own or industry standard.

There is always a solution possible which RAAC can provide for your organization.
